column3: @theuni Is this ok to do now?\n

Not yet. It's building quickly now because it's been incrementally cached. The issue will be fresh builds with no cache (#7165 as an example, which will essentially be a complete rebuild).

I think we should work on speeding up tests first. I played around with parallelizing the rpc tests yesterday with reasonable success.

Additionally, https://github.com/travis-ci/travis-build/pull/706 will
Maybe we can build against the platform qt in the meantime?\nThe qt tests aren't very worthwhile, but building against qt was a good way to make sure a full compilation still works.\n
Concept NACK per above discussion but I am leaving this open as an issue to indicate something needs to be done here.\n
